title: PomoAether
description: A fully self-contained, aesthetic Pomodoro timer featuring task tracking and spatial audio notifications.

title: AetherCalculus
description: Scientific engineering console. Supports suffix notation (k, M, G), integration, and differentiation.

title: AetherMarkdown
description: A feature-rich Markdown to PDF utility with Syntax highlighted Codeblock.

title: TetraFlux
description: A feature-rich Tetris clone with ghost pieces, hard drops, and mobile-first touch controls using the Catppuccin palette.
